projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: I designed and developed a personal portfolio website using React.js, showcasing my proficiency in modern web development technologies. This project not only serves as an online resume but also demonstrates my creativity, attention to detail, and ability to deliver a polished user experience.

projects.name: Ecommerce App
projects.description: Crafted an engaging and user-friendly interface for the project, emphasizing intuitive navigation, responsive design, and a modern aesthetic to enhance the user experience.

projects.name: Sociverse
projects.description: I developed Sociverse, a full-stack, real world application designed to help users discover nearby events and create their own. Built using React.js and Tailwind CSS for the front end, and Node.js with PostgreSQL for the back end, the app features seamless Google Maps integration for location-based event searches.

experiences.description: Collaborative Development: Worked closely with the development team to create responsive and visually appealing user interfaces for web applications. Technical Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript And React to implement design mockups and ensure seamless user experiences across devices. During my internship, I successfully developed fully functional front-end websites using a robust tech stack, including Bootstrap for responsive design, HTML5 for structuring content, and React.js for dynamic and interactive user interfaces. Leveraging my skills in React, I implemented efficient and scalable components, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Developed a full-stack application to help users discover nearby events and create their own. Focused on enhancing user experience through intuitive design and seamless functionality. Utilized React.js for building a dynamic and responsive user interface. Employed Tailwind CSS for styling, ensuring a modern and consistent design across the platform. Implemented Google Maps API for location-based event searches, enabling users to find nearby events with ease.
